text:
Hello Great minds.

When a contact is added to a company, is there an API to make it primary?

The scenario is when a contact is added to multi companies and there's a need to make one, the primary company. The api endpoint to achieve this <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/create-and-use-association-labels#:~:text=To%20set%20the%C2%A0primary%20company%2C%20select%C2%A0Set%20as%20%5Brecord%5D%27s%20primary%20company%C2%A0under%20the%20company%20you%20want%20to%20be%20primary.%20If%20you%27re%20associating%20a%20record%27s%20first%20company%2C%20it%20will%20be%20primary%20by%20default>.

Hi All,
I need to post session stored `UTM` values for a large number of HubSpot form embeds.
Does anyone know if HubSpot form will accepts additional posted key/values if they are set in a HubSpot form?
The corresponding properties for each utm field do exist in HubSpot.

Or am I going to have to add each of these as hidden fields to each form?
Thanks
yeah HubSpot will accept additional posted key/value is they are set in a HubSpot form

Hello :wave:  if you work remotely and never know where to go with high speed Wi-Fi and a good coffee?? We got different places on our slack channel Rejoignez-moi sur Slack, une façon plus simple et rapide de travailler. S’inscrire ici à partir de n’importe quel appareil : <https://join.slack.com/t/nomadoffice/shared_invite/zt-1nw8brv5y-JLNsU~OhTFdOhLCMUXq~CA|https://join.slack.com/t/nomadoffice/shared_invite/zt-1nw8brv5y-JLNsU~OhTFdOhLCMUXq~CA>
I don't think there's a way to get in there and modify those core HS scripts like that :slightly_smiling_face:

The fb one shouldn't be loaded by default by HubSpot, it should be coming from the website settings that you can find here: <https://app.HubSpot.com/settings/portalid/website/pages/all-domains/page-templates> just post a screenshot of what appears in your header input box

Hi everyone :wave:
I have been working on a project a few months ago (we went live in October)  but today, when I tried to create a new page, the tab “Add” was disabled. The template is totally empty whereas it should display some default modules with dummy content.
 It happens with all the templates I tried, and it has never happened before. I don’t think the client has made any changes (same happens on staging and the client does not have access to staging). I checked the source code and the `{% dnd_area "body_dnd_area" %}` is still there, with default content and everything.
Did I miss an update or something? Does anyone knows why it stopped working suddenly?
Cheers
